list.title: APP_STATES
list.description:
Application State Constants

Defines the main application states/pages

list.title: AllSizes
list.description: All sizes — shows small, medium, and large button sizes side by side.

list.title: AllVariants
list.description: All variants — shows every button variant side by side for comparison.

list.title: AtBoxBoundary
list.description: Cell at 3×3 boundary — demonstrates the thick bottom and right borders.

list.title: Button
list.description:
Button Component

Reusable button with multiple variants and sizes.

list.title: Cell
list.description:
Cell Component

Represents a single cell in the Sudoku grid. Handles user input validation (only digits 1-9 or empty). Applies special styling for 3x3 box borders and non-editable cells.

list.title: CookieConsent
list.description:
CookieConsent Component

Displays a consent banner informing users about local data storage. Compliant with data protection principles and Ukrainian Law No. 2297-VI "On Personal Data Protection".

This application does not use HTTP cookies — only localStorage for saving game progress, settings, and leaderboard scores.

list.title: DIFFICULTY_LEVELS
list.description:
Difficulty Levels

Available difficulty levels for the game

list.title: DIFFICULTY_SETTINGS
list.description:
Difficulty Settings

Configuration for each difficulty level including:

  • label: Display name
  • filledCells: Number of pre-filled cells
  • description: User-friendly description

list.title: Danger
list.description: Danger button — used for destructive actions like "Exit" or "Clear Data".

list.title: Difficulty
list.description:
Difficulty Component

A controlled select input for choosing game difficulty level. Displays difficulty options with their descriptions.

list.title: Disabled
list.description: Disabled state — demonstrates the disabled appearance across variants.

list.title: Disabled
list.description: Disabled cell — appears when the game is paused or completed.

list.title: Empty
list.description: Empty editable cell — the default state when a player starts a new game.

list.title: GRADE_STATUS
list.description: Grade status values

list.title: Game
list.description:
Game Page Component

Main game page that:

  • Loads player data and saved game
  • Renders SudokuGame component
  • Handles game completion and navigation

Uses Zustand stores for state management

list.title: GameCompletionDialog
list.description:
GameCompletionDialog Component

Modal dialog displayed when the player completes the Sudoku game. Shows game statistics and provides options to play again, restart, or view results. Uses Portal for rendering outside the normal DOM hierarchy.

list.title: GameControls
list.description:
GameControls Component

Displays the bottom control buttons for the game. Currently includes an Exit button to return to the start screen.

list.title: GameHeader
list.description:
GameHeader Component

Displays the game header with player information, difficulty level, game statistics, and control buttons (Pause/Resume and Reset).

list.title: GameStats
list.description:
GameStats Component

Displays game statistics including moves, time, and mistakes. Formats time display using formatTime utility. Applies color coding based on performance thresholds.

list.title: GameStorageService
list.description:
GameStorageService - Service for managing game-related storage operations

Handles all localStorage operations for:

  • Player data
  • Game settings
  • Saved game state
  • Game results
  • Scores leaderboard

list.title: GameStorageService#clearAllGameData
list.description: Clear all game data

list.title: GameStorageService#clearPlayerData
list.description: Clear all game data for specific player

list.title: GameStorageService#getAllScores
list.description: Get all scores from leaderboard

list.title: GameStorageService#getGameResults
list.description: Get game results

list.title: GameStorageService#getGameSettings
list.description: Get game settings

list.title: GameStorageService#getPlayerData
list.description: Get player data by ID

list.title: GameStorageService#getSavedGame
list.description: Get saved game state

list.title: GameStorageService#removeGameResults
list.description: Remove game results

list.title: GameStorageService#removePlayerData
list.description: Remove player data

list.title: GameStorageService#removeSavedGame
list.description: Remove saved game

list.title: GameStorageService#saveGameProgress
list.description: Save game progress

list.title: GameStorageService#saveGameResults
list.description: Save game results

list.title: GameStorageService#saveGameSettings
list.description: Save game settings

list.title: GameStorageService#savePlayerData
list.description: Save player data

list.title: GameStorageService#saveScores
list.description: Save scores to leaderboard

list.title: Game~handleBackToStart
list.description: Handle back to start navigation Clears ALL game and player data and returns to start page

list.title: Game~handleGameComplete
list.description: Handle game completion Saves results and navigates to scores page

list.title: Game~handleSaveProgress
list.description: Handle game progress saving

list.title: Grid
list.description:
Grid Component

Renders the 9x9 Sudoku grid with all cells. Manages cell change events and disabled state for the entire grid. Shows a loading message if the board is not yet available.

list.title: MOVES_STATUS
list.description: Moves status thresholds and values

list.title: MOVES_THRESHOLDS
list.description: Minimum possible moves for perfect solution

list.title: MiniGrid
list.description: Mini grid — shows a 3×3 section of cells to demonstrate border styling.

list.title: NAME_VALIDATION
list.description:
Validation Constants

Constants for form validation rules

list.title: PauseOverlay
list.description:
PauseOverlay Component

Displays a pause overlay when the game is paused. Shows a centered "Game Paused" message and covers the game board.

list.title: Player
list.description:
Player Component

Displays a single player entry in the leaderboard with rank, name, and score. Can highlight the current user with a special style. Shows grade with appropriate color based on score.

list.title: Portal
list.description:
Portal Component

Renders children into a DOM node that exists outside the parent component's DOM hierarchy. Useful for modals, tooltips, and other overlay components. Creates the container element if it doesn't exist and cleans up when empty.

list.title: PreFilled
list.description: Pre-filled (read-only) cell — a number that was part of the original puzzle.

list.title: Primary
list.description: Primary button — used for main actions like "Start Game" or "Play Again".

list.title: ROUTES
list.description:
Application Routes

Centralized route definitions to avoid hardcoded URLs throughout the app. Makes it easier to refactor routes and maintain consistency.

list.title: ROUTE_PATHS
list.description: Route paths for React Router configuration These are the patterns used in

list.title: SCORE_THRESHOLDS
list.description: Score thresholds for grades

list.title: STORAGE_KEYS
list.description:
Storage Keys

localStorage keys used throughout the application

list.title: SUDOKU
list.description:
Sudoku Game Constants

Core constants for Sudoku game rules and grid structure

list.title: Scores
list.description:
Scores Page Component

Displays game results and leaderboard:

  • Shows current game results
  • Displays player ranking
  • Shows top 10 leaderboard
  • Provides navigation options

Uses Zustand stores for state management

list.title: ScoresList
list.description:
ScoresList Component

Displays a list of players with their rankings and scores. Can optionally show the current player separately below the list.

list.title: Scores~handleBackToStart
list.description: Clean up and return to start page Clears ALL game and player data (cleanup old sessions too), keeping only scores

list.title: Scores~handlePlayAgain
list.description: Navigate to game page to play again

list.title: Secondary
list.description: Secondary button — used for alternative or less prominent actions.

list.title: Start
list.description:
Start Page Component

Entry point of the application where players:

  • Enter their name
  • Select game difficulty
  • Start a new game

Uses Zustand stores for state management

list.title: StartForm
list.description:
StartForm Component

Main form for starting a new game. Collects player name and game difficulty settings.

Uses react-hook-form for name validation and state management. Game settings are managed separately as they're stored independently.

list.title: StartForm~handleDifficultyChange
list.description: Handle difficulty change

list.title: StartForm~onSubmitForm
list.description: Handle form submission

list.title: Start~handleFormSubmit
list.description: Handle form submission - start new game session

list.title: Start~handleSettingsChange
list.description: Handle game settings changes

list.title: StorageService
list.description:
StorageService - Abstraction layer for data storage operations

Benefits:

  • Centralized error handling
  • Automatic JSON serialization/deserialization
  • Easy to replace localStorage with another storage
  • Easy to test (can pass mock storage)

list.title: StorageService#clear
list.description: Clear entire storage

list.title: StorageService#get
list.description: Get value from storage

list.title: StorageService#has
list.description: Check if key exists in storage

list.title: StorageService#keys
list.description: Get all keys from storage

list.title: StorageService#remove
list.description: Remove value from storage

list.title: StorageService#set
list.description: Save value to storage

list.title: Success
list.description: Success button — used for positive confirmations like "Save" or "Complete".

list.title: SudokuGame
list.description:
SudokuGame Component

Main game component that orchestrates the Sudoku game logic. Manages game state, board operations, timer, statistics, and user interactions. Handles game persistence, pause/resume functionality, and completion flow.

Now gets player data directly from Zustand stores (no props drilling!)

list.title: SudokuGenerator
list.description:
SudokuGenerator - Service for generating Sudoku puzzles

This service handles all the logic for creating valid Sudoku boards using backtracking algorithm and randomization.

list.title: TIME_STATUS
list.description: Time status thresholds and values

list.title: TIME_THRESHOLDS
list.description: Time thresholds in seconds

list.title: WithValue
list.description: Editable cell with a value — represents a player-entered number.

list.title: addScore
list.description:
Add a new score to the leaderboard

  • If player exists, update only if new score is better OR equal (to move up in ranking)
  • If player doesn't exist, add new score
  • Keep only top 100 scores
  • Auto-sort by score descending, then by date descending (newer first)

list.title: calculateScore
list.description:
Calculate final game score based on performance metrics

Scoring algorithm:

  • Base score: 1000 points
  • Time penalty: -1 point per second over 180 seconds (3 minutes)
  • Moves penalty: -2 points per move over 81 (minimum possible moves)
  • Mistakes penalty: -50 points per mistake

list.title: classNames
list.description: Combine multiple class names into a single string Filters out falsy values (null, undefined, false, '')

list.title: clearAll
list.description: Clear all players and results

list.title: clearAllGames
list.description: Clear all game data (reset store)

list.title: clearGame
list.description: Clear/delete a player's saved game

list.title: clearPlayerData
list.description: Clear all data for a player (data + results) Also triggers persist to save changes immediately

list.title: clearScores
list.description: Clear all scores (reset leaderboard)

list.title: cn
list.description: Combine CSS module styles with conditional classes

list.title: fillBoard
list.description:
Fill the board using backtracking algorithm

This recursive function fills an empty board with valid numbers using backtracking when it hits a dead end.

list.title: formatTime
list.description: Format time in seconds to MM:SS format

list.title: generatePlayerId
list.description:
Generate a unique player ID

Creates a unique identifier by combining:

  • Current timestamp (base36 encoded)
  • Random string (base36 encoded)

list.title: generatePuzzleBoard
list.description:
Generate a Sudoku puzzle board based on difficulty

Creates a puzzle by:

  1. Generating a complete solved board
  2. Removing cells based on difficulty level
  3. Creating cell objects with metadata (editable, position, etc.)

list.title: generateSolvedBoard
list.description:
Generate a completely solved Sudoku board

Creates a valid 9x9 Sudoku board with all cells filled using random number placement and backtracking.

list.title: getAllScores
list.description: Get all scores

list.title: getGameResults
list.description: Get game results for a player

list.title: getGradeStatus
list.description: Get grade status for styling

list.title: getMovesStatus
list.description: Get moves status based on number of moves

list.title: getPlayerData
list.description: Get player data by ID

list.title: getPlayerRank
list.description: Get player's rank by name

list.title: getPlayerScore
list.description: Get player's score data by name

list.title: getSavedGame
list.description: Get saved game for a player

list.title: getScoreColor
list.description: Get score color class based on final score

list.title: getScoreGrade
list.description: Get score grade based on final score

list.title: getTimeStatus
list.description: Get time status based on elapsed time

list.title: getTopScores
list.description: Get top N scores from leaderboard

list.title: isValidPlacement
list.description:
Check if a number can be validly placed at a position in the board

Validates against:

  • Row constraint (no duplicate in same row)
  • Column constraint (no duplicate in same column)
  • 3x3 subgrid constraint (no duplicate in same subgrid)

list.title: removeGameResults
list.description: Remove game results for a player

list.title: removePlayerData
list.description: Remove player data

list.title: removeScore
list.description: Remove a specific score by ID

list.title: saveGameProgress
list.description: Save game progress for a player

list.title: saveGameResults
list.description: Save game results for a player

list.title: savePlayerData
list.description: Save player data

list.title: setCurrentPlayer
list.description: Set current active player

list.title: setGameSettings
list.description: Update game settings (difficulty)

list.title: shuffleArray
list.description: Shuffle an array in place using Fisher-Yates algorithm

list.title: startNewGame
list.description: Start a new game session for a player

list.title: useGamePersistence
list.description:
Custom hook for automatic game progress persistence

Features:

  • Automatic saving with debounce
  • Save on game state changes
  • Load saved game on mount
  • Clear saved game when completed

This hook extracts the auto-save logic that was previously embedded in SudokuGame component's useEffect.

list.title: useGamePersistence~clearSavedGame
list.description: Manually clear saved game

list.title: useGameStats
list.description:
Custom hook for managing game statistics and state

Manages:

  • Move counter
  • Mistake counter
  • Score tracking
  • Game completion state
  • Game pause state

Note: Score calculation logic has been moved to utils/score/calculateScore This hook only manages the state, not the calculation logic.

list.title: useGameStats~completeGame
list.description: Mark the game as completed

list.title: useGameStats~incrementMistakes
list.description: Increment the mistakes counter by 1

list.title: useGameStats~incrementMoves
list.description: Increment the moves counter by 1

list.title: useGameStats~resetStats
list.description: Reset all statistics to initial values

list.title: useGameStats~restoreStats
list.description: Restore statistics from saved game state

list.title: useGameStats~togglePause
list.description: Toggle the pause state between paused and unpaused

list.title: useGameStats~updateScore
list.description: Update the score value

list.title: useGameStore
list.description:
Game Store - Global state management for game data

Manages:

  • Current player session
  • Saved games per player
  • Game settings (difficulty)
  • Auto-persistence to localStorage

Uses Zustand with persist middleware for automatic localStorage sync

list.title: useLoadSavedGame
list.description: Load saved game for a player

list.title: usePlayerStore
list.description:
Player Store - Global state management for player data

Manages:

  • Individual player data per playerId
  • Game results per player
  • Player cleanup operations
  • Auto-persistence to localStorage

This store complements gameStore by managing player-specific data and results.

list.title: useScoresStore
list.description:
Scores Store - Global state management for leaderboard

Manages:

  • All player scores
  • Leaderboard rankings
  • Score updates and sorting
  • Auto-persistence to localStorage

Features:

  • Keep only top 100 scores
  • Update player score only if new score is better
  • Automatic sorting by score (descending)

list.title: useSudokuBoard
list.description:
Custom hook for managing Sudoku board state

This hook manages the game board state and provides methods to:

  • Update cells
  • Check board completion
  • Validate cell placements
  • Generate new games
  • Restore saved games

list.title: useSudokuBoard~isBoardComplete
list.description: Check if the board is completely filled

list.title: useSudokuBoard~isValidPlacement
list.description: Check if a value can be validly placed at a position Uses the validateCellPlacement service for validation logic

list.title: useSudokuBoard~newGame
list.description: Start a new game with optional different difficulty

list.title: useSudokuBoard~resetBoard
list.description: Reset the board with a new puzzle

list.title: useSudokuBoard~restoreBoard
list.description: Restore a previously saved board state

list.title: useSudokuBoard~updateCell
list.description: Update a cell value in the board

list.title: useTimer
list.description:
Custom hook for managing a game timer

Features:

  • Counts up in seconds
  • Can be activated/deactivated
  • Supports initial time for resuming games
  • Provides reset, pause, and restore methods
  • Automatically cleans up intervals

list.title: useTimer~pause
list.description: Pause the timer by clearing the interval

list.title: useTimer~reset
list.description: Reset timer to 0 seconds

list.title: useTimer~restore
list.description: Restore timer to a specific time (for resuming saved games)

list.title: validateCellPlacement
list.description:
Validate a cell placement in a board

This is used by the UI to check if a player's move is valid
